property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Noble. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character leaves play, Éomer gets +2 Û attack until the end of the round. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Isengard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Lower the cost of the next card you play from your hand this round by 1. That card gains Doomed 1. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Istari. Isengard.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 3. At the end of the round, discard Saruman from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Saruman enters play, choose a non-unique enemy or location in the staging area. While Saruman is in play, the chosen enemy or location is considered to be out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword, ready Orthanc Guard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword, Isengard Messenger gets +1 Ò until the end of the round. (Limit twice per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard Westfold Outrider to choose an enemy not engaged with you. Engage the chosen enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Westfold Horse-breeder enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Mount attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ï or Rohan hero. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached hero participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, exhaust Rohan Warhorse to ready attached hero.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ê hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attached hero is ready, shadow cards dealt to enemies engaged with you are dealt face up. (Shadow card effects are still resolved when resolving enemy attacks.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword, exhaust Keys of Othanc to add 1 resource to attached hero's resource pool.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Add 1 resource to each hero's resource pool.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Each player draws 2 cards.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Each player chooses 1 enemy engaged with him. Until the end of the phase, each chosen enemy cannot attack the player that chose it.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Each player may choose and discard a Condition attachment from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Search your deck for a card with the Doomed keyword and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value:
If free of encounters, the first player gains control of Grima.
Action: Exhaust Grima to draw a card.
If Grima leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to Player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Islet is the active location, each Dunland enemy in play gets +1 $

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Fords of Isen is in the staging area, players cannot gain resources from card effects.
Forced: After Fords of Isen becomes the active location, each player with fewer than 5 cards in his hand draws cards until he has 5 in his hand

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value:
While any player has 3 or more cards in hand, The King's Road gets +3 quest points.
While any player has 5 or more cards in hand, the King's Road gains: 'When faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to The King's Road, if able.'

property.name: Encounter Set

property.value: While Gap of Rohan is in the staging area, Dunland enemies get +1 Û

property.name: Shadow

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose: Either remove 1 time counter from the current quest, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Dunland enemy, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. If any player has 5 or more cards in hand, this effect cannot be canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player draws this card into his hand. Ill tidings cannot leave that player's hand. Then, if the first player has 5 or more cards in his hand, Ill Tidings gains surge.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add The Islet to the staging area and attach Grima to that location. Each player searches the encounter deck for 1 different Dunland enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the Encounter Deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value:
Time 5. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, discard Grima from play.
The players cannot advance unless the first player controls Grima.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 different Dunland enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the Encounter Deck.
Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls where X is the number of cards in his hand. Place 2 time counters on this stage.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a different Dunland enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Fords of Isen

property.name: Text
property.value:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, discard the top X cards of the encounter deck. X is the number of card's in the first player's hand. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area. Put 3 time counters on this stage.
While there is at least 1 enemy in play, the players cannot defeat this stage. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: To Catch an Orc

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player removes the top 20 cards of his deck and places them aside, as an out-of-play deck, The first player takes Mugash plus 1 Mugash's Guard for each other player in the game and randomly shuffles one facedown into each player's out of play deck. Place any remaining copies of Mugash's Guard aide, out of play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: To Catch an Orc

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck for a Mountain location and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Then, advance to Stage 2

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: To Catch an Orc

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: To Catch an Orc

property.name: Text
property.value:
Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, shuffle the discard pile into the encounter deck and reveal 2 encounter cards per player. Place 2 time counters on this stage.
Response: After questing successfully, cancel all progress that would be placed on this stage. Then, place 1 time counter on this stage. Or, if Mugash is in play, advance to stage 3.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: To Catch an Orc

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: To Catch an Orc

property.name: Text
property.value:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, return Mugash to the staging area and reveal X encounter cards. X is the number of players in the game minus 1. Place 3 time counters on this stage.
Progress cannot be placed on this stage unless Mugash is attached to a hero.
If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Into Fangorn

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add Edge of Fangorn to the staging area an attach Mugash to that location. Shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal X encounter cards where X equals the number of players in the game minus 1.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Into Fangorn

property.name: Text
property.value:
Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, shuffle Mugash into the encounter deck and advance to stage 3.
The players cannot advance to stage 2 unless Mugash is attached to a hero.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Into Fangorn

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Huorn enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Into Fangorn

property.name: Text
property.value:
Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, shuffle Mugash into the encounter deck and advance to stage 3A.
The players cannot defeat this stage unless Mugash is attached to a hero.
If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Into Fangorn

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Into Fangorn

property.name: Text
property.value:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, discard the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. Each player must choose an enemy or objective in the discard pile, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Place 3 time counters on this stage.
Forced: After placing progress here, if there is at least 6 progress on this stage and Mugash is attached to a hero, advance to stage 2A.
